skchr_catap_1.name: Blast Range Up α

ATK +100%; Range expands; Attacks all targets within range simultaneously
Gitano stops attacking for 10 seconds after using this skill

skchr_greyy_2.name: Electrostatic Discharge

skchr_cammou_2.name: Synchronized Attack

Range expands, ATK +70%; releases Drone to attack enemies, and grants self and Drone a 27% chance to stun enemies for 1.0 seconds
The Drone locks onto an enemy until the enemy is defeated or until the skill is over, then returns to the Operator

skchr_shotst_2.name: Armor Breaker - Spread

skchr_clour_2.name: Double Shot

skchr_mm_1.name: Paralyzing Shell

skchr_mm_2.name: Binding Shock

Immediately launches an attack that deals 200% damage, ignoring 250 of the target’s DEF

skchr_glaze_1.name: Snaring Shell

skchr_glaze_2.name: Radar Sweep

skchr_blackd_2.name: Command - Defense

Immediately gains 3 Deployment Points

skchr_vigna_2.name: Hammer-On
skchr_vigna_2.description: Attack Interval increases a bit; ATK +200%

skchr_myrtle_2.name: Healing Wings

skchr_doberm_2.name: Spur

skchr_peacok_1.name: Judgment

Increases the ATK of the next attack to 200%(Has a 5% chance to instead become 800%)
Can store 3 charges

Immediately deals 350% ATK to all enemies in range as arts damage and silences their special abilities for 5 seconds.

skchr_frostl_1.name: Frost Tomahawk

skchr_estell_2.name: Sacrificial Strike

skchr_frncat_1.name: Scratch

skchr_jaksel_1.name: Grit Those Teeth!

skchr_cutter_2.name: Crimson Crescent

ATK +70%, attacks Silence the target for 2 second(s)
Unlimited duration

ATK +60%, each attack heals a nearby friendly unit's HP equal to 50% of the damage dealt

skchr_myrrh_1.name: Dual Healing

The next heal is increased to 125% of ATK and can target 1 extra ally

Buffs the target ally in the next healing, restoring HP by 35% of Gavial's ATK (by 70% of Gavial's ATK when the target's HP is lower than 50%) per second, lasting 5 seconds

skchr_ccheal_2.name: Vitality Restoration - Wide Range

skchr_susuro_2.name: Deep Healing

ATK +100%, ASPD +100
Can be used up to twice in one battle

skchr_plosis_2.name: Enkephalin

skchr_breeze_2.name: Widespread Therapy

skchr_headbr_2.name: Ursus's Roar

Gradually gains 12 DP over the skill duration
All Vanguard Operators' ATK and DEF +60%; Gains 1 extra DP when killing an enemy

skchr_snakek_2.name: Shell Defense

skchr_bubble_2.name: "Beaten Up"

skchr_yak_1.name: Stamina Enhancement

Starts cooking and stops attacking for 10 seconds; DEF +80%

skchr_tiger_1.name: Armorcrusher

skchr_platnm_2.name: Pegasian Sight

ASPD reduces slightly, but ATK +100%; Range expands

The next attack shoots 2 times, each shot dealing 140% ATK as physical damage

skchr_excu_1.name: Muzzle’s Elegy

skchr_aosta_2.name: Shadow Nails

skchr_amiya_2.name: Spirit Burst

Fires 8 times with 60% ATK when attacking and attacks random targets within range
Automatically activated; Amiya is Stunned for 10 seconds after the skill duration

skchr_amiya_3.name: Chimera

Applies the Nightmare effect to up to 5 enemies within range:
Decreases the Movement Speed of affected enemies by -60% for 10 seconds, and makes them suffer Pure damage proportional to the distance they move during this effect

skchr_absin_1.name: Enforcement Mode

ATK +90%, and attacks now prioritize enemies with the lowest percentage of remaining HP
Unlimited duration

skchr_skfire_2.name: Fire of Heaven

skchr_acast_1.name: "All For Me"
skchr_acast_1.description: ASPD +70, the ATK of all Casters +40%

skchr_leizi_2.name: Thunderclap
skchr_leizi_2.description: ATK +150%, and attacks no longer deal reduced damage on subsequent targets

skchr_beewax_2.name: Guardian Obelisk

sktok_beewax.name: Summon Sand Obelisk
sktok_beewax.description: When deployed, deals 300% Arts Damage to nearby enemies and stuns them for 3 seconds

skchr_mint_1.name: Wind Whispers
skchr_mint_1.description: Range expands; Attacks deal 160% ATK as Arts damage

skchr_mint_2.name: Swirling Vortex

skchr_lionhd_2.name: Deconstruct and Detonate

Range expands, immediately deals 230% Arts Damage to all enemies within range and reduces their RES by -15% for 6 seconds
Can store up to 3 charges

skchr_otter_1.name: Bionic Device
skchr_otter_1.description:
All Robotters gain 35% Physical and Arts Dodge
Allies on Robotters' four adjacent tiles also gain the same buff

sktok_motter_1.name: Bionic Device
sktok_motter_1.description:
All Robotters gain 35% Physical and Arts Dodge
Allies on Robotters' four adjacent tiles also gain the same buff

skchr_otter_2.name: Detonate and Recycle
skchr_otter_2.description:
Detonates all deployed Robotters immediately, dealing 600% of Mayer's ATK Arts damage to nearby enemies and Stunning all hit targets for 2 seconds
The exploded Robotters will be recycled

sktok_motter_2.name: Detonate and Recycle
sktok_motter_2.description:
Detonates all deployed Robotters, dealing 600% of Mayer's ATK Arts damage to nearby enemies and Stunning them for 2 seconds
The exploded Robotters will be recycled

skchr_folivo_1.name: Protective Camouflage
skchr_folivo_1.description:
Increases the ATK of all Buggy Cams by +60% and grants them Camouflaged (will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks when not blocking, but can still take Splash damage)
Unlimited duration

skchr_folivo_2.name: Panoramic Overload
skchr_folivo_2.description:
Immediately obtains 1 Buggy Cam and grants all deployed Buggy Cams increased Detection Range, ATK +130%, DEF +130%, and RES +20
After the skill ends, all Buggy Cams are stunned for 5 seconds

sktok_folivo_2.name: Panoramic Overload
sktok_folivo_2.description: All Buggy Cams are stunned for 5 seconds when the skill ends

skchr_silent_2.name: Medical Drone
skchr_silent_2.description:
Obtains a Medical Drone
Can store at most 1 drone; The drone heals its surrounding allies when entering the battlefield and self-destructs after 10 seconds

skchr_bldsk_1.name: Emergency Triage
skchr_bldsk_1.description:
The next heal restores an additional 25% of its target's Max HP
Only available when the target's HP is lower than 50%; Can store 4 charge(s)

skchr_bldsk_2.name: Unstable Plasma
skchr_bldsk_2.description:
Warfarin and a random ally within range obtain the following status:
ATK +90%; Loses 3% of Max HP per second, lasting for 15 seconds

skchr_folnic_2.name: Compound Drug Shell

skchr_amedic_1.name: Apocalyptic Scene

skchr_ceylon_1.name: Concentrated Hydrotherapy
skchr_ceylon_1.description:
Increases next healing's amount to 200% of ATK. The amount will not be reduced by trait effects
Can charge for 3 times

skchr_ceylon_2.name: Water Blessing
skchr_ceylon_2.description: ATK +60%, each attack heals 1 additional target, and while this effect is active, increases the status resistance of allies within range. (The duration of stun, snare, and freeze effects are reduced by 50%)

skchr_whispr_1.name: Oriented Diagnosis
skchr_whispr_1.description: The next heal is increased to 130% of ATK, and an additional target will be healed (prioritizes debuffed units) and granted status resistance (reduces the duration of stun, cold, and freeze effects by 50%), lasting for 5 second(s)

skchr_whispr_2.name: Pain Suppression
skchr_whispr_2.description:
Attack interval reduced, the healing effect of this unit’s Talent is increased to 200%, and each target healed by this unit is granted status resistance for 4 second(s) (reduces the duration of stun, cold, and freeze effects by 50%)
Unlimited duration

skchr_deepcl_1.name: Shadow Tentacle

skchr_skgoat_2.name: Quicksand Conversion

skchr_podego_1.name: Aromatherapy

skchr_podego_2.name: Spread Spores

Throws a vial that, upon shattering, releases of cloud of spores for 6 seconds
All enemies within the spore cloud are Snared and Silenced, and receive 80% Arts Damage every second

skchr_ethan_1.name: Fancy Maneuvers

skchr_ethan_2.name: Suspended Cross

skchr_sqrrel_1.name: Steam Pump

skchr_sqrrel_2.name: High-Pressure Water Cannon

skchr_nearl_1.name: First Aid
skchr_nearl_1.description:
Restores the HP of a nearby ally with less than 50% HP by 180% of the Operator's ATK in the next attack

skchr_helage_2.description: ATK +80%, changes attack to twice attack, obtaining 75% Physical Dodge

skchr_helage_3.name: Full Moon
skchr_helage_3.description: ATK +100%, attack range +2 tiles, can attack up to 3 targets simultaneously

sktok_crate.name: Obstruct
sktok_crate.description:
Deploy a Roadblock, changing enemies' route
If the Roadblock is deployed on enemies, they will destroy it

sktok_emp.name: EMP Blast
sktok_emp.description: Consumes 10 DP to immediately deal damage to all nearby enemies and Stun the targets hit for 15 seconds

sktok_gate.name: Gate Closing
sktok_gate.description: Consumes 10 DP to close the gate

sktok_sensor.name: Detection
sktok_sensor.description: Nearby enemies' Invisibility is disabled when the skill is activated

sktok_antidr.name: Drone Interference
sktok_antidr.description:
Enemy's drones within range cannot attack, lose their special ability and lose 50% Movement Speed
Enemies will attack this drone first

sktok_ballis.name: Bolt Launching
sktok_ballis.description: Shoots a bolt forwards, dealing Physical damage to the first Operator hit

sktok_farm.name: Startup!
sktok_farm.description: Consume 20 DP to activate: DEF +200%, RES +20, restores 10 HP per second, and increases Operator Deployment Limit by +1

sktok_frosts.name: Frigid Tide
sktok_frosts.description: Launches a frigid shockwave, inflicting the Cold status upon targets hit for 10 seconds

sktok_ore.name: Pulse Wave
sktok_ore.description: Emits a pulse wave in the surrounding tiles, dealing 500 True Damage to all allied and enemy units; Certain enemies are strengthened

sktok_mine.name: Detonate
sktok_mine.description: Explodes when an enemy passes by, dealing 2000 True Damage to all nearby enemies and making them take +50% more damage for 15 seconds

sktok_blower.name: Airflow
sktok_blower.description: Blows out an airflow towards the 3 frontal tiles; Operators deployed downstream/upstream from the airflow have increased/decreased ATK; Enemies moving downstream/upstream from the airflow have increased/decreased Movement Speed

sktok_tower.name: Arts Transfer Protocol
sktok_tower.description: Each attack deals Arts damage to an enemy equal to 5% of its Max HP; Every 5 seconds, restores 10% HP to an allied unit

sktok_tree.name: Natural Camouflage
sktok_tree.description: Increases the DEF of adjacent allied units; Aftering being cleared by a [Rhodes Island Temporary Employee], turns into a deployable Ranged tile

sktok_bomb.name: Ill Temper
sktok_bomb.description: Stun all enemies in the four adjacent tiles for 12 seconds

sktok_electric.name: Energized!
sktok_electric.description: Activation: Trigger an electric current every 2 seconds, dealing 250 Arts damage to passing enemies and inflicting Slow for 1 seconds

sktok_roadblock.name: Obstruction
sktok_roadblock.description: Blocks the advance of Talulah, the Fighter, and Ursus Civilians; Able to be destroyed by your units

sktok_flame.name: Energy Crystallization
sktok_flame.description: Self-destructs after 25s, sending fireballs in the cardinal directions that deal 1500 Arts damage; Targets hit are afflicted with [Burning Breath] (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be resisted)

sktok_frosts_friend.name: Frigid Tide
sktok_frosts_friend.description: Launches a frigid shockwave, inflicting the Cold status upon enemy targets hit for 10 seconds

sktok_ore_friend.name: Pulse Wave
sktok_ore_friend.description: Emits a pulse wave in the surrounding tiles, dealing 2000 True damage to all surrounding enemy units

sktok_npcsld.name: Form Up!
sktok_npcsld.description: More likely to be attacked by enemies

sktok_prison.name: Lock ‘em Up!
sktok_prison.description: Consumes 5 DP to immediately Stun all targets within range for 2 seconds and Imprison them (Will not reset the attack count of Imprisoned enemies)
